source.interface:
<implements name="Structure" />
* This interface represents a structure with a binary multiplicative * operation (·), satisfying the group axioms (associativity, neutral element, * inverse element and closure). Jean-Marie Dautelle 3.0, February 13, 2006
* Wikipedia: Mathematical Group
* Returns the product of this object with the one specified. that the object multiplier. this · that.
* Returns the multiplicative inverse of this object. It it the object * such as this.times(this.inverse()) == ONE , * with ONE being the multiplicative identity. ONE / this.
